column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I prefer Giordano's over this place. It takes 35-40 minutes to make the pizza
column2: which is fine if you end up getting an incredible pizza. The pizza was just ok. We ordered a large half the Lou Manat√≠ special and half the classic. The sauce was good
column3: but the crust was not the best
column4: kind of hard and chewy at the same time. The cheese was terrible. It stretched but was like rubber. I had hope this would be a good deep dish but I will have to keep looking!
